title: Riot Girl Tristana Code isn't working for me... ):
body:
So, recently I found out that you can get Riot Girl Tristana for free by liking the League Of Legends facebook page. I took the code and tried to redeem it in my client and it said "There was a problem fufilling your store items, please try again. If this problem persists please contact us at support.riotgames.com"

Please help, I really want this skin.

replies.body: No worries, let us help!  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), maybe we can work something out.  :D  See you there!
